headline: 3M Leadership Moves Align With Regulatory Focus And Perceived Undervaluation
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) has appointed Meagan Linn as Senior Vice President, Government Affairs. The company has also elected Neil G. Mitchill, Jr. to its Board of Directors. These leadership changes focus on government relations and financial oversight at the corporate level. For investors watching 3M, these appointments come with the share price at $167.62 and a value score of 4. The stock is up 14.6% over the past year and 3.6% year to date, while the 7 day return shows a 3.4% decline. That mix of...
